code: import axios from'axios';axios.defaults.baseURL='/api';axios.interceptors.request.use(function(request){var token=window.localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){request.headers['Authorization']="Bearer ".concat(token);}return request;});export var login=function login(form){return axios.post('/user/login',form).then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(e){throw e.response.data;});};export var register=function register(form){return axios.post('/user/register',form).then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(e){throw e.response.data;});};export var user=function user(){return axios.get('/user').then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(e){throw e.response.data;});};export var getCash=function getCash(){return axios.get('/stock/cash').then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(e){throw e.response.data;});};export var getPortfolio=function getPortfolio(){return axios.get('/stock/portfolio').then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(e){throw e.response.data;});};export var getTransactions=function getTransactions(){return axios.get('/stock/transactions').then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(e){throw e.response.data;});};export var buyStock=function buyStock(form){console.log('endssssssssssss');return axios.post('/stock/buy',form).then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(e){throw e.response.data;});};export var sellStock=function sellStock(number,symbol){return axios.get('/stock/sell',{params:{'number':number,'symbol':symbol}}).then(function(res){return res.data;}).catch(function(e){throw e.response.data;});};
